name: PIXELS OF A MAN [2023] demo edition
name_original: PIXELS OF A MAN [2023] demo edition
description:
PIXELS OF A MAN [2023] demo edition is a RPG, puzzle and platformer game developed by Dock Heist Unit. It was originally released in 2022.
You can play PIXELS OF A MAN [2023] demo edition on Web, Android, Linux and macOS. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
